backend/main.mo: Actor implementing access control and user profile management with auto-registration and role checks, storing profiles in an OrderedMap.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI changes for inline Trade Logger behavior and related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing functionality of various frontend files across the app.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication flow, page routing, and conditional profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/CustomToolManage: Dialog UI for creating, editing, ordering, and deleting custom tools with dynamic property management.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that displays a fallback UI and allows page reload on errors.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright text and a caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar handling theme toggle, user auth state, and navigation between pages.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Landing screen prompting users to authenticate via Internet Identity with feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/ModelBuilder.tsx: Interactive builder for creating and editing ICT trading models with tool selection and configuration.
frontend/src/components/ModelCardSummary: Dialog displaying a concise summary of a model’s tools and properties before saving.
frontend/src/components/ModelWizard.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a future multi‑step model creation wizard.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for capturing and saving a user's name during initial profile setup.
Tool for comparing user-selected observations against saved models to compute adherence and suggest matching setups.
frontend/src/components/ToolConfigDialog: Renders a dialog for configuring tool settings with dynamic property fields based on tool type. Includes numerous predefined enums and a property configuration map used to generate the UI.
frontend/src/components/TradeDetailDialo: Displays a detailed editable view of a trade, including bracket outcomes, notes, emotions, and images. Handles loading trade data, updating bracket groups, and saving outcomes.
frontend/src/components/TradeForm.tsx: Provides a full form for creating or editing trades, including model selection, conditions, bracket setup, validation, and scenario calculations. Includes many helpers for numeric parsing and tool description extraction.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes. Provides the current actor and fetch status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook, managing authentication, stored identities, login flow, and related status flags. Wraps AuthClient and exposes login, clear, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for CRUD operations on models, trades, and related data via the backend actor. Automatically manages caching, invalidation, and dependent fetch behavior.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables for themes, dark mode overrides, and responsive rules for a trade form layout to prevent overflow.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Analytics.tsx: Loads trades and models, applies filters, computes extensive analytics metrics, and renders charts and insights.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays high-level trading stats, equity curve, recent trades, and top model performance with navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/Models.tsx: Lists trading models with create, edit, and delete capabilities using a model builder and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/Trades.tsx: Manages viewing, filtering, creating, editing, and deleting trades with detailed dialogs and a trade form.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/adherence.t: Computes adherence-based performance comparisons between all completed trades and those above an adherence threshold.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/brackets.ts: Calculates per-bracket metrics such as TP/SL hit rates and realized R across completed trades.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/distributio: Creates histogram bins from R values by evenly splitting their range and counting items per bin.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/equityCurve: Computes an equity curve and max drawdown from completed trades using cumulative P/L over time.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/htfBias.ts: Derives HTF bias from model tools and aggregates trade performance metrics grouped by bias type.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/metrics.ts: Calculates overall performance metrics such as win rate, P/L totals, averages, and profit factor for completed trades.
Runs Monte Carlo simulations using trade R values to generate random equity paths and summary statistics.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/sessionAnal: Computes trading metrics per session (Asia, London, NY) based on trade timestamps and completed trade data.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/timeBuckets: Aggregates trades into hourly and weekday buckets, computing win rates and P/L for each group.
Evaluates each tool's performance impact by comparing metrics for trades with vs. without the tool.
Provides session inference and filters trades by model, session, and adherence, plus a helper for completed trades.
Groups trades into volatility buckets using stop‑loss/entry ratios and computes performance metrics for each.
frontend/src/utils/setupIdentifier/adher: Maps selected observations to model conditions and computes an adherence score based on checked conditions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL params (including hash routing) and persisting them in sessionStorage, with helpers to clear stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state and requirements for converting the Trade Logger modal into an inline embedded UI on the Trades page.
